level.heading: Severability.
level.text: Should a court of competent jurisdiction hold any provision of this chapter to be invalid, then the remaining provision of the chapter shall be considered to be severable and given full effect.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-101
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-101, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 4-201.01.
